name: darvinstudio/darvin-utils-bundle
description: This bundle provides 'darvin-utils' library integration for Symfony.

suggest.symfony/form: Allows to use Form dependent components
suggest.symfony/property-access: Allows to use PropertyAccess dependent components
suggest.symfony/security-bundle: Allows to use Security dependent components
suggest.symfony/translation: Allows to use Translation dependent components
suggest.symfony/twig-bundle: Allows to use Twig dependent components
